content: **new update includes slime graph and new updated contact info and how to find me on facebook and my blog **all pattern problems reported have been fixed please email if you find an issue** this pattern was made for my son who loves minecraft i had a lot of fun making this pattern the pattern is written for a kids adult and large adult size this one is different from my first creeper hat in the fact that the top shaping is different and the graphic repeats around making it a little easier to do the colorwork enjoy **i take no credit for the creeper logo/graphic*** it is property of mojang and minecraft
